title: Coyote Gorgeous
description: Arizona Game Ranger Madison Huntley discovers disturbing details while investigating a wild animal attack on a horse ranch in Cave Creek, Arizona.  As a biologist and wildlife expert she believes in facts and science--not the scary legends frightening the ranch hand. When Kaletaka, a Hopi sculptor, awakens bloody with no recollection of the night before, he remembers the legends of his tribe.Can Madison solve the mystery killings and insure the safety of the town? Let alone her own safety? Each step closer to the truth and to Kaletaka unleashes an unspeakable evil, and no one is safe…
author: Vijaya Schartz
